text: Sergei Ivanovich Furgal ( (pronounced foor-GAHL); born 12 February 1970) is a Russian politician. He was Governor of Khabarovsk Krai from 28 September 2018 until 20 July 2020. He was arrested on 9 July 2020.В Хабаровском крае в должность вступил новый глава региона. Far Eastern Federal District. 28 September 2018. Retrieved 11 August 2020. Furgal was also a member of the State Duma from 2007 to 2018. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party.Врачей для государственных больниц и поликлиник предлагают обучать бесплатно . Primgazeta.ru. 10 March 2016. Retrieved 11 August 2020. On 9 July 2020, Furgal was arrested by authorities on charges of involvement in multiple murders of several businessmen in the region and nearby territories in 2004 and 2005. He could face life in prison if convicted. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Amur Oblast Category:Khabarovsk Krai
title: Sergei Furgal
